title: Sanju
writer: Abhiruchi Chand, Rajkumar Hirani, Abhijat Joshi
short_cast: Ranbir Kapoor, Vicky Kaushal, Paresh Rawal, Sonam Kapoor, Dia Mirza, Jim Sarbh, Anushka Sharma, Manisha Koirala, Boman Irani
cast: Ranbir Kapoor, Vicky Kaushal, Paresh Rawal, Sonam Kapoor, Dia Mirza, Jim Sarbh, Anushka Sharma, Manisha Koirala, Boman Irani
genre: Movies Based on Real Life, Hindi-Language Movies, Bollywood Movies, Dramas
desc: From the depths of addiction to the heights of stardom to underworld entanglements, this biopic traces the checkered past of Indian actor Sanjay Dutt.
